scripts.publish:experimental:canary: BRANCH_NAME=`git rev-parse --symbolic-full-name --abbrev-ref HEAD`; if [ $BRANCH_NAME != "dev" -a $BRANCH_NAME != "main" ] ; then CI=1 lerna publish --force-publish --canary --preid experimental-${BRANCH_NAME} --dist-tag=experimental-${BRANCH_NAME} ; fi
scripts.publish:stable: npm run test && CI=1 lerna publish
scripts.publish:backport: npm run test && CI=1 lerna publish --preid backport --dist-tag=backport
scripts.translation:sync: npm run translation:extract && npm run translation:publish && npm run translation:import
scripts.translation:extract: rm -rf packages/geoprocessing/src/i18n/lang/en && mkdir -p packages/geoprocessing/src/i18n/lang/en && NODE_ENV=development npx babel 'packages/geoprocessing/src/**/*.{ts,tsx}' 'packages/template-blank-project/src/**/*.{ts,tsx}' 'packages/template-ocean-eez/src/**/*.{ts,tsx}' > /dev/null && mv extractedTranslations/en packages/geoprocessing/src/i18n/lang && rm -rf extractedTranslations && echo 'Translations extracted to packages/geoprocessing/src/i18n/lang/en'
